EmailTemplate.subject: Epic Games Partner Order {{{Partner_Request__c.Name}}} update for {{{Partner_Request__c.Partner_Name__c}}}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for submitting your Twinmotion annual subscription order.
We have prepared or updated an organization record for the customer and applied the specified quantity of Twinmotion annual subscription licenses. - Organization ID: {{{Partner_Request__c.Org_Id__c}}} - for Epic/Partner internal purposes only - no need to share with customer
NOTE: Since the customer's listed license administrator did not already have an Epic Games Account, we have prepared their organization with a placeholder owner, and issued them an invitation to join the organization and create their Epic Games Account in the process. This is mentioned in the customer information below.
You are welcome to share the below information with the customer's license administrator.
Thanks
- The Epic Games Developer-Access Team
Twinmotion License ManagementAs the license administrator for your company, you have been granted administrative privileges and are responsible for the management of your team's accounts and licenses for: - Annual License to Twinmotion < https://www.twinmotion.com/ > (including Twinmotion Cloud < https://www.twinmotion.com/twinmotion-cloud > ) - Offline Installer access
Notice:Because you do not currently have an Epic Games Account associated with your provided email address, a separate email message has been sent to you from help@mail.epicgames.com inviting you to join your company's organization record that Epic Games has prepared. Please accept this invitation and complete the setup of your Epic Games Account to access the resources below.
Please follow the link and log into the Epic Games account associated with your email address used here to access the Developer Portal < https://dev.epicgames.com/portal > . From here you may:
- Review the license seat quantity and expiration date - Invite colleagues to join your company’s organization - Assign and remove license seats from members of your organization - Download Offline Installers (available only to administrators) - Review product resources and support options
Additional Information
You may optionally install the licensed software from the Epic Games launcher < https://www.twinmotion.com/download > , or by using the provided Offline Installer.
To access learning materials and discussion forums, visit the Epic Developer Community < https://dev.epicgames.com/community/twinmotion > .
Thank you!
